.. _rahrah.citation:

Citation
========

If you use this package or the scripts in this repository in a publication, please add a footnote linking to `https://github.com/avapolzin/rahrah <https://github.com/avapolzin/rahrah>`_ and/or consider adding this software to your acknowledgments. To cite ``rahrah``, please use the `Zenodo reference <doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.14511594>`_.
